ca.mcgill.cs.comp303.rummy.model

Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.cs.comp303.rummy.model.Hand

  • public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a hand of 10 cards. The hand is not sorted. Not threadsafe. The hand is a set: adding the same card twice will not add duplicates of the card.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hand()
      Creates a new, empty hand.

      Adds pCard to the list of unmatched cards.

      Calculates the matching of cards into groups and runs that results in the lowest amount of points for unmatched cards.

      Removes all the cards from the hand.

      Creates a group of cards of the same rank.

      • isMatched

        public boolean isMatched()

      • add

        public void add(ca.mcgill.cs.comp303.rummy.model.Card pCard)
        Adds pCard to the list of unmatched cards. If the card is already in the hand, it is not added.
        Parameters:
        pCard - The card to add.
        Throws:
        ca.mcgill.cs.comp303.rummy.model.HandException - if the hand is complete.
        ca.mcgill.cs.comp303.rummy.model.HandException - if the card is already in the hand.

      • remove

        public void remove(ca.mcgill.cs.comp303.rummy.model.Card pCard)
        Remove pCard from the hand and break any matched set that the card is part of. Does nothing if pCard is not in the hand.
        Parameters:
        pCard - The card to remove.

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete()
        Returns:
        True if the hand is complete.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all the cards from the hand.

      • getMatchedSets

        public java.util.Set<ca.mcgill.cs.comp303.rummy.model.CardSet> getMatchedSets()
        Returns:
        A copy of the set of matched sets

        public java.util.Set<ca.mcgill.cs.comp303.rummy.model.Card> getUnmatchedCards()
        Returns:
        A copy of the set of unmatched cards.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        The number of cards in the hand.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(ca.mcgill.cs.comp303.rummy.model.Card pCard)
        Determines if pCard is already in the hand, either as an unmatched card or as part of a set.
        Parameters:
        pCard - The card to check.
        Returns:
        true if the card is already in the hand.

      • score

        public int score()
        Returns:
        The total point value of the unmatched cards in this hand.

      • createGroup

        public void createGroup(java.util.Set<ca.mcgill.cs.comp303.rummy.model.Card> pCards)
        Creates a group of cards of the same rank.
        Parameters:
        pCards - The cards to groups
        Throws:
        ca.mcgill.cs.comp303.rummy.model.HandException - If the cards in pCard are not all unmatched cards of the hand or if the group is not a valid group.

      • createRun

        public void createRun(java.util.Set<ca.mcgill.cs.comp303.rummy.model.Card> pCards)
        Creates a run of cards of the same suit.
        Parameters:
        pCards - The cards to group in a run
        Throws:
        ca.mcgill.cs.comp303.rummy.model.HandException - If the cards in pCard are not all unmatched cards of the hand or if the group is not a valid group.

      • autoMatch

        public void autoMatch()
        Calculates the matching of cards into groups and runs that results in the lowest amount of points for unmatched cards.
